addNewBountyPool(address,address,string,.details: Can only be called by the owner.

params._projectName: Name of the project that is hosting the bounty
params._projectWallet: Address that will be able to deposit funds, set APY and poolCap for the pool
params._referralEndTime: Timestamp up until the referral will be active
params._referralFee: Referral fee that the referrer will receive (in BPS), max 50%
params._referrer: Address of the individual that referred this bounty to The Saloon
params._token: Token to be used by bounty pool

params._pid: The pool id for the bounty

params._saloonWallet: Address where the funds will go to

params._token: Token used by the bounty that was referred

params._saloonWallet: Address where the funds will go to

params._endTime: The new end time for the referral bonus
params._pid: The pool id for the bounty

setSecurityCouncilMembers().details: Facet needs to be redeployed to change variables. this enforces the upgrade notice period when owner tries to change them

setUpgradePeriodAndNumberOfApprovals().details: Facet needs to be redeployed to change variables. this enforces the upgrade notice period when owner tries to change them

updateTokenWhitelist(address,bool,uint25.details: Only one token is allowed per pool

params._minStakeAmount: The minimum amount for staking for pools pools using such token
params._token: ERC20 to add or remove from whitelist
params._whitelisted: bool to select if a token will be added or removed

acceptOwnershipTransfer().notice: Accepts transfer of admin rights. Only pending owner can accept the role.

billPremium(uint256).notice: Bill premiums for a single pool.

collectAllReferralProfits().notice: Allows referrers to collect their profit from all bounties for all tokens

collectAllSaloonProfits(address).notice: Transfer Saloon profits for all tokens from premiums and bounties collected

collectReferralProfit(address).notice: Allows referrers to collect their profit from all bounties for one token

collectSaloonProfits(address,address).notice: Transfer Saloon profits for a specific token from premiums and bounties collected

extendReferralPeriod(uint256,uint256).notice: Extend the referral period for the bounty. The new end time can only be larger than the current value.

setPendingOwner(address).notice: Starts the transfer of owner rights. Only the current owner can propose a new pending one.New owner can accept owner rights by calling `acceptOwnershipTransfer` function.

startAssessmentPeriod(uint256).notice: Starts assesment period where users can withdraw instantly and  bounty payouts dont use stakers fund

updateTokenWhitelist(address,bool,uint25.notice: Updates the list of ERC20 tokens allow to be used in bounty pools_minStakeAmount must either be set on first whitelisting for token, or must be un-whitelisted and then re-whitelisted to reset value
